ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Each time heritrix extract the outlinks of a document, if it discover a link like http://www.domain.com/a/b/c.html I would like to create some

Hi,

Each time heritrix extract the outlinks of a document, if it discover =
a link like http://www.domain.com/a/b/c.html I would like to create some de=
pendency/prerequisite like forcing heritrix to always fetch the root url (e=
g http://www.domain.com/) before the found url (if it has not been crawled =
previously). 

So my goal is to always crawl the root url (http://www.domai=
n.com) for all new website I discover, before fetching any deeper urls.

I =
think the way to increase/decrease priority is by using UriPrecedencePolicy=
, but I don't know how and when to insert/schedule the "fetch that root url=
" prerequisite...
